ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Natural Health Products Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the NATURAL HEALTH PRODUCTS REGULATIONS (NHPR) in order to (1) require important product information be presented in a standardized facts table; (2) require labelling of food allergens, gluten, added sulphites and aspartame; (3) subject regulatory text to legibility requirements; (4) require a manufacturer or importer to display an e-mail address, telephone number, or website address within an NHPâ€™s Product Facts.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0146 Publication Date: 2022-07-06
AttachmentsAttachment
